title: panic: batches panic :-(
body:
I get irregular "panic" from k6 when running with batches. Both windows and *nix versions produce the same error, both in k6 version 0.12.1
[loadimpactairv2.zip](https://github.com/loadimpact/k6/files/828110/loadimpactairv2.zip)



```C:\Users\Michael\michael@loadimpact.com\LoadImpact\k6>k6 run --type js loadimpactairv2.js

          /\      |‾‾|  /‾‾/  /‾/
     /\  /  \     |  |_/  /  / /
    /  \/    \    |      |  /  ‾‾\
   /          \   |  |‾\  \ | (_) |
  / __________ \  |__|  \__\ \___/  Welcome to k6 v0.12.1!

  execution: local
     output: -
     script: loadimpactairv2.js (js)

   duration: 10m, iterations: 0
        vus: 1, max: 100

    web ui: http://127.0.0.1:6565/

   running [===================================================>======]    panic: Error: Post http://loadimpactair.guldskeden.se/Pages/Booking: net/http: request canceled

goroutine 561 [running]:
panic(0xb8d800, 0xc064a158e0)
        C:/Program Files (x86)/Go/src/runtime/panic.go:500 +0x1af
github.com/loadimpact/k6/js.throw(0xc0467fd910, 0xaf9620, 0xc064a1b320)
        C:/Users/Michael/AppData/Local/Go/src/github.com/loadimpact/k6/js/util.go:60 +0x12e
github.com/loadimpact/k6/js.JSAPI.HTTPRequest(0xc046cf06e0, 0xc045f2401e, 0x4, 0xc045f24030, 0x30, 0xc0649ef4a0, 0x159, 0xc0645e5900, 0x4f, 0x0)
        C:/Users/Michael/AppData/Local/Go/src/github.com/loadimpact/k6/js/api_http.go:80 +0x1644
github.com/loadimpact/k6/js.JSAPI.BatchHTTPRequest.func1(0xc064a12500, 0xc046cf06e0, 0xc045f2401e, 0x4, 0xc045f24030, 0x30, 0xc0649ef4a0, 0x159, 0xc0645e5900, 0x4f, ...)
        C:/Users/Michael/AppData/Local/Go/src/github.com/loadimpact/k6/js/api_http.go:143 +0xc7
created by github.com/loadimpact/k6/js.JSAPI.BatchHTTPRequest
        C:/Users/Michael/AppData/Local/Go/src/github.com/loadimpact/k6/js/api_http.go:149 +0x47c```

Script to execute attached in zip-file.
